property.name: text
property.value: This model implements a GRU network to provide temperature prediction using weather timeseries measurements (14 weather values per measurement) as input. Set the desired number of predictions by modifying the "predictions" parameter. At a specific time moment, this model uses the hourly weather measurements of 10 days (240 hours) in the past to predict the temperature at the same time of the next day.

entity.name: DiscreteClock
entity.doc: Create periodic timed events.

property.name: text
property.value: Sensor measurement source. It is a transparent actor which can be used in a DE environment.

entity.name: LineReader
entity.doc: Read one line at a time from a text file and output as a string

property.name: text
property.value: Parameter "i" indicates the GRU processing step. Parameter "c" indicates the prediction count.

property.value: This is a transparent composite actor. It must be contained in an SDF director.

property.name: text
property.value:
For normalization, we subtracted mean and divide by standard deviation, which is: y = (input - mean)/std
Now, in order to de-normalize, we do: input = y*std + mean
